name: Mysticle's Zombie Game (Not A Copy)
description: On December 15, 2020, the Youtuber known as mysticle made a devlog about making his first game in 24 hours, He said that he will release the game to the public via his discord (spoiler he didn't) so I opened unreal and make a totally distinct game from his,100% didn't copy it, It is still in development this is a very early access version also it  will be released on GitHub for those who want to make a 100% not a copy game
